data.title: Interlibrary Loan Request Form
data.text:
Please fill out the form below to request special interlibrary loan items, including book kits, microfilm, and items you could not locate in our catalog. Ensure that all fields are completed and agree to our terms and conditions. Please note that submitting a request does not guarantee that we can obtain these items. If you have any inquiries, please contact the Interlibrary Loan Department at (785) 320-5369 or via email at ill@mhklibrary.org.

"*" indicates required fields

Contact Person*

First Last

Library Card Number*

Email

Phone*

ILL Request Type

Book Request Information

Book Title and Author*

To view a full list, click here.

Alternate Selection*

Number of copies needed*

MPL will not provide additional copies if the selected kit does not have enough copies for your group. Choose the kit that has the closest number of copies needed. If a kit has more copies than necessary, you will only be given the number you actually need.

Reels Needed*

General Request

List*

Item Title

Item Author

Other Information

Format*

Book

Book (Large Print Format)

Audiobook

DVD

Blu-ray

Music CD

Other

Additional Information

Out-of-state ILL Search

Check this box if you would like interlibrary loan staff to search out-of-state libraries if no Kansas libraries are able to lend the item. Fees may apply, and staff will contact you with further information before expanding the search to verify.

Comments

Terms & Conditions

Consent*

BOOK KITS: The contact person will be responsible for ALL copies requested. Book kits will be checked out on the contact person's library card.

Due to the average length of time to check availability and receive kits, we require at least two weeks’ notice when placing a request.

Titles must be chosen from the list of kits provided on our website and are subject to availability. ILL will not supplement kits that do not have enough copies for a group.

MICROFILM: Microfilm must be looked at inside the library and can be picked up from the Reference Desk on the second floor.

Reels must be chosen from those available from the Kansas Historical Society.

ALL ITEMS ARE SUBJECT TO AVAILABILITY.

I agree to the above terms and conditions.

Phone

This field is for validation purposes and should be left unchanged.

Δ
